org.universAAL.ri.api.manager

Class RemoteUAAL.SListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.universAAL.ri.api.manager.RemoteUAAL.SListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISListener
    Enclosing class:
    RemoteUAAL

    public class RemoteUAAL.SListener
extends Object
implements ISListener
    Custom ISListener to be used in the callS() method of the Utility API. It has access to the client remote node endpoint information. This is called from the single ServiceStrategy thread. This method will perform network operations, which will take time. Unfortunately it cannot use a Thread for them because it is a synchronous execution that must return a response, and it would block anyway.
    Author:
    alfiva

    • Method Detail

      • handleCall

        public ServiceResponse handleCall(ServiceCall call)
        This is called everytime a ServiceCall is addressed to a remote node. It will pack the callback message and send it to the client remote node endpoint.
        Specified by:
        handleCall in interface ISListener
        Parameters:
        call - The call to send back to the client
        Returns:
        The response that the client will have created
        See Also:
        ServiceCallee.handleCall(org.universAAL.middleware.service.ServiceCall)
